import React from "react" import PropTypes from "prop-types" import image from "../../../assets/images/food.jpg" import "../../../assets/stylesheets/home/restaurants.css" const Restaurants = (props) => { return (
{props.restaurants.map((restaurant, index)=>(
{restaurant.name}
{restaurant.spaciality}
{restaurant.area}
))}
{/* */} ) } export default Restaurants
